name: ecstatic
description: CLI tool for website optimization - download, optimize, and deploy static sites

scripts.compile: npm run compile-jampack && npm run compile-siteone && npm run compile-ecstatic
scripts.compile-ecstatic: rm -rf ./dist-exec/* && NODE_ENV=production npx bun build --compile --define process.env.ECSTATIC_ENV='"production"' --minify --target=bun-linux-x64 ./bin/ecstatic.js --outfile ./dist-exec/ecstatic
scripts.compile-jampack: tar -cJf packages/jampack/jampack-dist.tar.xz -C node_modules/@divriots/jampack dist/ node_modules/ package.json
scripts.compile-siteone: cp packages/siteone/siteone-crawler/bin/swoole-cli packages/siteone/siteone-crawler/src/ && tar -cJf packages/siteone/siteone-dist.tar.xz -C packages/siteone/siteone-crawler src/
